org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.auctions

Interface Auctioneer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccessMediator, StorageBroker

    public interface Auctioneer
    This interface is implemented by the AccessMediator and StorageBroker and provides methods of communication between these and the Auction.

    Copyright (c) 2002 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fileAvailable(Auction auction, DataFile winningFile)
      A call-back method used by the Auction to notify the Auctioneer when the file is available.
      float getMaxPrice() 
      GridSite getSite() 

    • Method Detail

      • getSite

        GridSite getSite()
        Returns:
        The Auctioneer site

      • getMaxPrice

        float getMaxPrice()
        Returns:
        The maximum price this Auctioneer will pay for the file

      • fileAvailable

        void fileAvailable(Auction auction,
                   DataFile winningFile)
        A call-back method used by the Auction to notify the Auctioneer when the file is available. If noone won the auction, winningFile is null. The Auction class must guarantee it calls auctionComplete before calling this method.
        Parameters:
        auction - The auction in question
        winningFile - the DataFile of the winning replica, or null if noone won.
